COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe
STRING: I had a dream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a
STRING: It was a faint dream, one I'd likely forget upon waking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116
STRING: But it was terribly real, and unsettling enough to make
me want to scream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: While I was in the dream, though, I knew that I was
dreaming.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144
STRING: Knowing it was a dream, I just wanted to wake up, but I
couldn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: It was always the same scene.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176
STRING: Someone was telling me goodbye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182
STRING: I didn't know their name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: I couldn't hear their voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: But I could feel their intention perfectly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4
STRING: “Goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: That one word was heavy and cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: “I can't be with you anymore”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e
STRING: “Goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a
STRING: And in the end, the tone softened, but it didn't mean
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: The softness itself pained me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: “You don't have to remember.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x294
STRING: “Forget about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6
STRING: “You really don't have to remember me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310
STRING: ...I don't want to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c
STRING: ...That's it!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328
STRING: That someone was telling me it was alright not to
remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x334
STRING: It was something I didn't have to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: ...Forget it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c
STRING: It wasn't time yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358
STRING: With that thought, I finally woke up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390
STRING: ...I don't want to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39c
STRING: But I had to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a8
STRING: I didn't know why, but that's how I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: Impatience, regret, remorse... My emotions were all
muddled together, so none of it seemed to matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: But I didn't have time...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: I had to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2
STRING: I just had to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498
STRING: There was a soft sound of flowing water.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: The sound of rain hitting the gutter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b0
STRING: I had woken from the dream, but that sound made me
melancholy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bc
STRING: The light that reached me through the thin clouds was
always a little subdued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c8
STRING: I made to get up and turn on the light, but the shadow
next to the desk stopped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: [Phorni] “Hi!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512
STRING: [Chris] “...Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: I'd just woken up from the dream, but I was already
starting to forget it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: [Phorni] “I always say this, but you look like a child
when you sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: Phorni said this cheerily, as if trying to dispel the heavy
atmosphere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x586
STRING: I should have answered her just as cheerily, but I
couldn't. I closed my eyes to remember the dream I'd
forgotten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: The sound of the rain pounded in my ears, drowning
out the memory.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5de
STRING: I tried to remember, but my impatience grew, and I
started getting confused again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: There weren't many words I could remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: “Goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: “I can't be with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x628
STRING: “There's no time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x634
STRING: That was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x648
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, you're going back to sleep. You already
woke up once, so be a man and open your eyes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68c
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: I opened my eyes and asked her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c2
STRING: I couldn't catch all the words, but I was sure someone
was talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d8
STRING: [Chris] “Did you just say something when I was sleeping
now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70a
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh? I told you not to go back to sleep, but...
were you really asleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72a
STRING: [Chris] “No, before that. When I was really sleeping.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh-uh, I didn't say anything... Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x772
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Alright, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: [Phorni] “You're strange. Anyway, would you mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ba
STRING: Phorni said this and fluttered her wings several times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: I picked her up and moved her to her favorite spot by
the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: Phorni looked outside from there, swinging her legs as if
bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80a
STRING: [Chris] “What time is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83c
STRING: [Phorni] “A little after nine. I was going to play a prank
on you if you didn't wake up... Too bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87a
STRING: I picked up the clock off the table and turned off the
alarm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x890
STRING: Maybe it's because I am dreading what Phorni will say
or do, but I always wake up before the alarm goes off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a6
STRING: I always got plenty of sleep; I turned on the alarm just
to be absolutely sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I guess I'll get dressed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ee
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, right. Don't forget the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x904
STRING: [Chris] “I put it in my bag yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92e
STRING: Phorni nodded with satisfaction and looked back at the
rain to signify that she had finished talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95a
STRING: [Phorni] “What? Rain again today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x970
STRING: [Chris] “The same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: [Phorni] “It's nice weather.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: [Chris] “...The same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e8
STRING: I replied and looked out the window with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f4
STRING: Both the rain and Phorni were really the same as
always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa00
STRING: But somewhere in my heart, in my mind, there was...
impatience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: There's no time...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa18
STRING: Was it about the graduation recital?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: But I had never thought about it before in that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: And somehow I just knew that it wasn't about the
recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: So what was it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa50
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9a
STRING: Phorni's voice made me remember the first time I met
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab0
STRING: Back then, I was still having a hard time adjusting to life
in this city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac6
STRING: Maybe that's why I had never thought back about those
times until now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: It suddenly came back to me clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae8
STRING: Catching a cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: Thinking that she was a hallucination at first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb00
STRING: Doing an ensemble with her for the first time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0c
STRING: Her amazing voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb18
STRING: Then... I suddenly thought of when I would have to say
goodbye to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2e
STRING: Phorni was in this room before I got here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: Once I graduate, what will she do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb52
STRING: I've never talked to her about it before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: But there was only about three months left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6a
STRING: Was I avoiding the subject without realizing it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb76
STRING: And did that somehow manifest itself in a dream?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb82
STRING: It wasn't out of the realm of possibility, but it did seem
like quite a leap.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9a
STRING: Still... I had a feeling that I wasn't completely wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb0
STRING: At the same time, I didn't think I was completely right,
either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, shouldn't you be heading out soon?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm... Yeah, I'll be going then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5e
STRING: I was lost in thought for a while, but I still had time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc74
STRING: Because Monday was the day I put the letter to Arie in
the mail.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: The mail box was on the way to school, so I didn't need
to rush.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca0
STRING: But I seemed to hurry there every time for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: As I mailed Arie's letter, I was thinking not of Arie, but
of Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcee
STRING: I wondered what she was going do after I was gone,
but eventually thought better of wondering about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd04
STRING: But it made me reminisce about the early days with
Phorni for the first time in a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1a
STRING: The things we did since we first met, little things like
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd30
STRING: But for some reason, those memories made me feel
warm inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: A melody suddenly came to my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: It had been a while since I wanted to write a song. I
hadn't written any since the one I wrote about Arie that
I always performed in an ensemble with Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: As soon as I thought of it, I pretended to press the
Fortelle's keys with my fingers, and the notes appeared
in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8a
STRING: I didn't have time to stop, so I played imaginary keys in
the air as I walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc8
STRING: Once the song had taken some shape in my head, I
started to see some faults in it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: I could have written it out as a score at that point, but I
usually gave it some time before I started the actual
work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf4
STRING: I would usually start by revising the song over and over
in my head, almost subconsciously, as I was walking
down the hallway, or taking a shower.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: Only when those revisions were complete would I write
it out as sheet music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2a
STRING: That way I wouldn't be embarrassed by it later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: Thinking about such things, I put the song out of my
head for the moment, and hurried down the road to the
school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: There was a soft sound of flowing water.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee4
STRING: The sound of rain hitting the gutter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef0
STRING: The light that reached me through the thin clouds was
always a little subdued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: I made to get up and turn on the light, but the shadow
next to the desk stopped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: [Phorni] “Hi!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4e
STRING: [Chris] “...Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: [Phorni] “I always say this, but you look like a child
when you sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf96
STRING: [Chris] “Doesn't everyone look like a child when they
sleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc8
STRING: [Phorni] “How should I know? The only sleeping face
I've ever seen is yours. Anyway, if you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe8
STRING: She said this with evident satisfaction and fluttered her
wings a few times, as if she were bored with talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: I picked Phorni up and moved her to her favorite spot
by the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: Phorni sat there, swinging her legs as if she were bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1038
STRING: [Chris] “What time is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: [Phorni] “A little after nine. I was going to play a prank
on you if you didn't wake up... Too bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a2
STRING: I picked up the clock off the table and turned off the
alarm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b8
STRING: Maybe it's because I am dreading what Phorni will say
or do, but I always wake up before the alarm goes off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ce
STRING: I always got plenty of sleep; I turned on the alarm just
to be absolutely sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e4
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I guess I'll get dressed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1116
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, right. Don't forget the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: [Chris] “I put it in my bag yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: Phorni nodded with satisfaction and looked back at the
rain to signify that she had finished talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: [Phorni] “What? Rain again today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1198
STRING: [Chris] “The same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b6
STRING: [Phorni] “It's nice weather.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11cc
STRING: [Chris] “...The same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: I got dressed quickly and headed for the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: I wasn't in the habit of eating breakfast myself, and
Phorni didn't eat, period.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: So once I'd washed my face and gotten dressed, I was
ready to leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: The first thing I heard when I got outside was the rain
hitting the cobblestone street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: It wasn't a loud noise, but it was ingrained deep in my
eardrums, asserting itself like dirt that wouldn't go
away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: The city of rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b4
STRING: People new to this city always think first of those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ca
STRING: There was certainly a time when people called it that,
and the origin of the city's name comes from there as
well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e0
STRING: But nowadays, it was the city of music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ec
STRING: That fact was recognized by the people living here, and
they were proud of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: The lines of shops were part of the legacy as well; I
could escape the rain under their roofs and shake off
the droplets covering me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1322
STRING: I shook my head lightly and brushed the droplets off my
clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132e
STRING: I'd gotten used to the city enough to be able to do this
casually.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: The rain fell year round and probably because the
residents were so used it, nobody used an umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a6
STRING: It took a week for my letter to reach her and for her to
send me words of meaning in return.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13bc
STRING: I found myself imagining how I would spend that time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: I was too used to this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d4
STRING: I was too used to this city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e0
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ec
STRING: I couldn't get rid of a strange feeling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f8
STRING: Like this wasn't where I belonged...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1404
STRING: It was a strange feeling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: I thought if Phorni, Torta, and the letters from Arie
weren't there, maybe time would stop. Sounds foolish, I
know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: [Male] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146e
STRING: The voice of the stranger passing me from behind
shook me out of my reverie and I turned around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148c
STRING: [Male] “I'd like to mail a letter if that's alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right. I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c0
STRING: [Male] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d6
STRING: He thanked me, put his letter in the mailbox, and
walked away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ec
STRING: How long had I been lost in thought?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f8
STRING: Torta and Phorni had often told me it was a habit of
mine to suddenly zone out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150e
STRING: I couldn't get too wet and catch a cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x151a
STRING: I decided not to think anymore and started walking
unhurriedly down the road to the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: I arrived on campus a little after ten o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: I still had twenty minutes before my private lesson, so I
moved leisurely to the First Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157a
STRING: There weren't many students who came to school at
this time, but a few did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: You wouldn't see any first or second-year students, who
had classes in the morning, but when you became a
third-year, most of your lessons
were private lessons and your mornings started later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b0
STRING: Lessons began in the morning, but students quickly took
up all the afternoon classes, so morning classes were
mostly open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c6
STRING: However, if you went with the second round of classes
that started at ten thirty, it wasn't too hard to wake up
in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15dc
STRING: I didn't like crowds, so I was happy to have a morning
lesson.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: Beyond the hallways of lecture rooms, it took several
minutes to walk to the classrooms for private lessons.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1618
STRING: As might be expected from one of the best music
schools in the country, it was on a fairly grand scale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162e
STRING: Breathing the crisp and slightly humid morning air, I
headed toward my classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164c
STRING: With the language studies, vocal lessons, and the
general studies that first-years had to take, I could sense
quite a few people near the lecture rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166c
STRING: But all the private lesson rooms were sound-proofed, so
it was really quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: After lunch was when things were liveliest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1698
STRING: But I liked the morning air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a4
STRING: The layers of compressed air seemed to press against
my eardrums, and I felt the subtle, far-away sound of the
rain on my skin.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d6
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: I arrived fifteen minutes before the allotted time of ten
thirty, and it looked like Ms. Cordell wasn't there yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174a
STRING: She always came ten minutes before the lesson, so I
often arrived before her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1760
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1776
STRING: I pulled out a chair, got the Fortelle out of its case, and
began setting it up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178c
STRING: There was already a Fortelle set up, but I preferred my
own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17aa
STRING: I focused on my fingers and lightly played a sound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f4
STRING: I played the Fortelle like that for a few minutes, then
heard the door behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1812
STRING: [Cordell] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183c
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1852
STRING: I turned around and returned her greeting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1866
STRING: [Cordell] “Don't mind me. Continue.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187c
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, I've already finished.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x189a
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. You're a little early today, aren't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b0
STRING: Ms. Cordell looked at the clock on the wall and looked
to me for confirmation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c6
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f8
STRING: [Cordell] “We need to talk. Do you have someone in
mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190e
STRING: [Chris] “You mean a partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1940
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes. I'm sure you have someone in mind,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1956
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, about that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: [Cordell] “You'll need time to practice together, so there
isn't much time left.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198a
STRING: [Chris] “There's still a few months left.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19bc
STRING: [Cordell] “There's only two months left. That's less than
a few.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Is it that soon?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f0
STRING: [Cordell] “I know you aren't good at keeping track of
such things, but come on now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a06
STRING: [Chris] “If you know that, why did you even bother
asking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a38
STRING: [Cordell] “It's my job. So are you looking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4e
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, I suppose I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6c
STRING: [Cordell] “You're lying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a82
STRING: Jumping to conclusions like that was just like Ms.
Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8e
STRING: [Chris] “Why do you say that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aac
STRING: [Cordell] “I like to think I know you a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac2
STRING: [Chris] “Then... don't ask.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af4
STRING: [Cordell] “So I hit the mark.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0a
STRING: Saying this, she smiled slightly and mussed up my hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b16
STRING: I liked it when Ms. Cordell did this from time to time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b22
STRING: When it came to music, she showed no compromise
and treated students strictly, but that wasn't all there
was to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b38
STRING: Many students thought she was just a strict teacher,
though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4e
STRING: In truth, even I thought that until I had private lessons
with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b64
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, you hit the mark.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b82
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, there aren't many who can work with
your music. You're not very compromising.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's the problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bcc
STRING: I just laughed it off to escape the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd8
STRING: I had a feeling that the professor was overestimating
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be4
STRING: Among the many teachers at the school, Ms. Cordell
had the most faith in my abilities.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfa
STRING: But I didn't really see it in myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c06
STRING: The Fortelle is an instrument that requires magic, and its
tone depends heavily on the one playing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c1c
STRING: It's not like a piano or a cembalo that are played simply
by pressing the keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c32
STRING: Of course the strength of touch and manipulation of the
pedals change the sound, but that can't be compared
to the individual differences of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c48
STRING: You could say that the difference in sound is
comparatively close to a wind instrument. But it seems
closest to the human voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5e
STRING: And the sounds that I played were held in high regard
by Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c74
STRING: It's based a lot on intuition, and it's not something you
are really aware of when playing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8a
STRING: I thought I was just normal, but she was telling me I
was wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris... Are you listening?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cda
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Oh, sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0c
STRING: [Cordell] “I like your honesty. But you lose points for not
listening to me during class.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2c
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4a
STRING: [Cordell] “Okay... For now, let's begin the lesson.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d80
STRING: I answered her and took the sheet music out of my bag
to set it on the stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8c
STRING: Ms. Cordell peeked at it over my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da0
STRING: [Cordell] “The same song as always?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db6
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. It will depend on my partner, but for now
this is really the only one in consideration.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de0
STRING: [Cordell] “Fine, then. Play it from the beginning for now.
Okay, then, begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e34
STRING: I finished the song and turned around to receive her
feedback.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea2
STRING: [Cordell] “You're doing very well. There's nothing to
worry about there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef4
STRING: [Cordell] “But don't get cocky. You still haven't decided
on a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f14
STRING: [Chris] “So we're back to this again...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f32
STRING: [Cordell] “If you can't find a partner, you can't graduate.
I'd step in before it came to that, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f52
STRING: [Chris] “Could I ask what ‘stepping in’ means,
perchance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f84
STRING: [Cordell] “...Perchance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9a
STRING: She said this with an utterly disgusted look, and then
composed herself as if in resignation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fcc
STRING: [Cordell] “I'd find a suitable voice student and decide for
you. I can't let a skilled student not graduate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff6
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Is that so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2014
STRING: [Cordell] “You seem rather indifferent... Do you want to
graduate?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202a
STRING: [Chris] “Sometimes I wonder that myself...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2048
STRING: [Cordell] “What about Tortinita? You know her;
wouldn't she be perfect?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2068
STRING: [Chris] “I'll keep that in mind while I think it over. For
now I need to practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2090
STRING: [Cordell] “Alright. There aren't many, but you do have
some faults. Work on those.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b0
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ce
STRING: [Cordell] “Now, practice scales from F, one more time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2106
STRING: [Cordell] “That's good enough. You pass for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x211c
STRING: [Chris] “For... For now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213a
STRING: [Cordell] “It was neither good nor bad. It certainly didn't
reflect your true ability. Is something on your mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x215a
STRING: [Chris] “I've been getting an earful since yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2178
STRING: [Cordell] “About your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ac
STRING: [Cordell] “Tortinita?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c2
STRING: [Chris] “Well... That, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f4
STRING: [Cordell] “That too, huh? Fine... I won't say anything
until the last minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2214
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Thank you. But, is that alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2250
STRING: [Cordell] “If other people have already warned you,
what could I possibly say to make things better?
Besides, E426... I can help if it comes down to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x227a
STRING: [Chris] “You can help... Can you really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ac
STRING: [Cordell] “If I ask a voice student, yes. But in that case,
you will have no say in the choice. I can't let a skilled
student not graduate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d6
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f4
STRING: [Cordell] “You're still sounding indifferent. Let's just keep
practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2328
STRING: [Cordell] “From the beginning...for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2360
STRING: [Cordell] “It's no good, but you know that, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2376
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2394
STRING: [Cordell] “Good, then. It's not a bad thing to fail in
practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23aa
STRING: Saying this, the professor smiled softly as if she had
thought of something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d2
STRING: [Cordell] “The problem with you, Chris, is that you aren't
focused enough on your goal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e8
STRING: [Chris] “Meaning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2406
STRING: [Cordell] “You're making a mistake just by practicing the
song without having decided on a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2426
STRING: [Chris] “So we're back here yet again....”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2458
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm not saying it to annoy you. It isn't the time
to talk about this anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2478
STRING: [Chris] “That's... I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2496
STRING: [Cordell] “In that case, I'll believe you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ac
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ca
STRING: [Cordell] “You have an idea, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e0
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24fe
STRING: [Cordell] “Your friend, Tortinita?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2514
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2532
STRING: [Cordell] “She's graduating this year, isn't she? That's
perfect, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2552
STRING: [Chris] “I'll keep that in mind while I think about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2584
STRING: [Cordell] “I see... Okay, then. I'll step in if it comes to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a4
STRING: [Chris] “You'll step in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d6
STRING: [Cordell] “I'll ask a voice student. If you don't decide
before this year's lessons are over, I'll decide for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2600
STRING: [Chris] “That's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261e
STRING: [Cordell] “You have no say in it. I'm sure it's difficult for
you look for a partner when you can't even play the
song properly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x263e
STRING: Feeling a little agitated by her words, I replied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264a
STRING: [Chris] “That's not true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267c
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. I'll believe you, Chris. Decide soon on
your own, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x269c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26b2
STRING: I think she just conned me into deciding on a partner...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26be
STRING: I was at a loss for words as she smirked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f0
STRING: [Cordell] “Anyway, you need to practice. It will be good
to make your mistakes here. Once more from the
beginning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2732
STRING: Even after Ms. Cordell left, I remained in the classroom
to calm down after the excitement of playing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275e
STRING: Then I remembered the repeated advice and thought
about the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2774
STRING: It's not like I wasn't looking for a partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2780
STRING: I just wasn't very interested in it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278c
STRING: I knew I didn't have that much time to spare, so I just
couldn't work seriously at it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c2
STRING: “Piova Communal School of Music”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d0
STRING: The communal school of music was named after the
city. It boasted world-renowned facilities, and many
famous musicians called it their alma mater.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f0
STRING: With that tradition behind it, both entering and
graduating were said to be difficult.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fc
STRING: Being one of the few capable Fortelle students, it was
easy for me to get in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2812
STRING: And that is probably why I've had such a hard time of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281e
STRING: And, of course, I was given an appropriate task in order
to graduate from the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2834
STRING: A graduation performance held in the school's concert
hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284a
STRING: The graduation performance is judged by alumni and
active musicians gathered from around the country.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2860
STRING: Some students stayed on at the school after failing their
performance, but most inevitably quit on their own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2876
STRING: On the other hand, there were those who did so well
that they were instantly guaranteed success as
professional musicians.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288c
STRING: The standards for graduation have always been high.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2898
STRING: Regardless, Ms. Cordell said that I had a good chance of
graduating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ae
STRING: I'd had it drummed into me that it was all about
graduating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ba
STRING: There were two rules for a Fortelle performance, and no
matter how skilled you were, you couldn't pass if you
didn't fulfill those terms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28dc
STRING: First, the song performed had to be an original.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e8
STRING: I already had one, so there was no problem there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f4
STRING: The next was the problem; the song had to be
performed with a vocalist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290a
STRING: Normally, a third year voice student would be chosen as
a partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2916
STRING: As vocalists also needed to perform to graduate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2922
STRING: But the rules stated that the partner didn't need to be a
voice student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2938
STRING: That meant that it could be anyone, even someone
outside of the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x294e
STRING: That being said, pairing with someone not used to
singing in front of an audience was like asking to fail, so
I'd never heard of anyone pairing with anyone other
than a student of the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x296e
STRING: Well, it wasn't like I didn't have someone in mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x297a
STRING: But there were things that made me hesitate to pair
with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2990
STRING: The reason... I didn't even really know myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x299c
STRING: I did appreciate her voice and I'd known her since we
were kids. We were still close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29b2
STRING: So why? I asked myself, but I never came up with an
answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29f2
STRING: The chimes ringing to signal noon brought me back to
my senses.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29fe
STRING: I hadn't made plans with her, but I went to the cafeteria
to meet my childhood friend. She was a partner
candidate after all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a36
STRING: Unlike how it was in the morning, a few students were
out in the hallways chatting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4c
STRING: I slid past them and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a76
STRING: In the building I had just left, the First Hall, there were
classrooms, lecture rooms, and offices for the professors
and staff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a8c
STRING: And in the Second Hall I was heading to, there were
many individual practice rooms even smaller than the
classrooms. It also contained the cafeteria and the
library,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 2a8c
STRING: facilities not directly related to classes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aac
STRING: I passed the concert hall that stood between those two
buildings, and hurried under its roof to avoid the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af8
STRING: Being lunchtime, there were many students already
gathered in the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0e
STRING: It was big enough to cater for one hundred people at
one time, and it was half full.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b24
STRING: I put my bag down on a seat near a window I liked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b30
STRING: After ordering some risotto, I took it and sat down in
the chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b76
STRING: As I was stirring the contents of the bowl with a spoon,
I heard a familiar voice from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bbe
STRING: Torta sat down next to me, moving my bag over a
space.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bf0
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c06
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c24
STRING: [Torta] “This.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c3a
STRING: It must have fallen out when she moved my bag. Torta
was waving the sheet music that I had been using in
front of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c5a
STRING: [Chris] “What are you doing with that sheet music?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8c
STRING: [Torta] “Is this the song for your presentation?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca2
STRING: [Chris] “For now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc0
STRING: [Torta] “Do you have the whole song?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cd6
STRING: [Chris] “For now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d08
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... That habit of saying ‘for now’ is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d1e
STRING: [Chris] “You're telling me to stop, right? I'm working on
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d50
STRING: [Torta] “For now... Right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d66
STRING: Torta laughed feebly, giving the subject up as a joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d98
STRING: [Torta] “So, can I look?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dae
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead. I'll be eating.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd2
STRING: As I went through the motions of putting the slightly
cold risotto in my mouth, I watched her from the corner
of my eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 2dd2
STRING: It looked like she was reading the music
intently, checking the notes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dfa
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e10
STRING: Just as she finished reading the last page, I finished my
lunch.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e42
STRING: [Torta] “It's a pretty good song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e58
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e76
STRING: [Torta] “You did what you needed to anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8c
STRING: [Chris] “Did you think I was doing nothing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eaa
STRING: [Torta] “But you haven't chosen a partner yet, have you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec0
STRING: [Chris] “No, I haven't yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ef2
STRING: [Torta] “No matter how good the song is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f08
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell just gave me the same talk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f3a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh? Well, she's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f50
STRING: [Chris] “But why the both of you all of a sudden?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f6e
STRING: [Torta] “We're into December this week. You only have
two months left, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f8e
STRING: [Chris] “Wouldn't you say two whole months?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc0
STRING: [Torta] “No, I wouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ff2
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ Whatever; I'm going to eat my lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3008
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x301e
STRING: As I said this, Torta opened her lunch box on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3032
STRING: [Torta] “So, do you have any ideas?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3048
STRING: [Chris] “That may be the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x307a
STRING: [Torta] “So you don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3090
STRING: [Chris] “Don't jump to conclusions.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c2
STRING: [Torta] “Doesn't take a genius.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30d8
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's not that I don't have any ideas.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3102
STRING: Her cheeks stuffed with sandwich, Torta replied with a
slightly surprised look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3120
STRING: [Torta] “Aw cass...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3136
STRING: [Chris] “Don't talk with your mouth full.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3168
STRING: [Torta] “Mm... Of course, it's someone other than me,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x317e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31b0
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? There really is someone else?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c6
STRING: [Chris] “You seem really surprised...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31f8
STRING: [Torta] “Who, by the way? Do I know this person?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3224
STRING: It was just some voice student that Ms. Cordell said she
could ask...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x323a
STRING: In the end, I was leaving it to my teacher and not doing
anything myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3246
STRING: I got ready to be taken to task, and as I searched for
the words to explain, Torta laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3264
STRING: [Torta] “Huh, wow. So you are working on it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x327a
STRING: [Chris] “Kind of...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ac
STRING: [Torta] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330c
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it's not like I'm doing nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x333e
STRING: [Torta] “Huh, I see. That's good. Is it a girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3354
STRING: I just tossed out a reply and Torta said something I
didn't really understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336a
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? What do mean ‘is it a girl?’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3388
STRING: [Torta] “I'm asking if it's a girl. Have you heard the
rumors...? Of course you haven't... You don't know
much about that stuff.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33b2
STRING: [Chris] “You answered my question with a question...
And you don't know that I don't know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33ee
STRING: [Torta] “So? Is it a girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3404
STRING: [Chris] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x343e
STRING: [Torta] “Ah, you hesitated.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3454
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I did.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346a
STRING: It hadn't been decided yet, so I couldn't answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe I should tell my sister.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34a8
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... This has nothing to do with Arie. Aaah,
alright, I get it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e4
STRING: [Torta] “So you're ready to confess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34fa
STRING: [Chris] “Confess, huh...? Odd choice of words.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3524
STRING: Torta must have sensed the strange emotion in my
words and tilted her head questioningly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x353a
STRING: [Chris] “I said I had an idea, but the truth is, it isn't
decided yet. If it comes to it, Ms. Cordell will ask a voice
student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3580
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... So that means you haven't decided yet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3596
STRING: [Chris] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c8
STRING: [Torta] “So... You're slacking off!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35de
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3610
STRING: [Torta] “It's like you think it's someone else's job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3626
STRING: [Chris] “You could say that. It doesn't feel real.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3658
STRING: [Torta] “This isn't the time for that, is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366e
STRING: [Chris] “The time doesn't matter. Things usually just
move ahead when the time comes, don't they?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36aa
STRING: [Torta] “But if they don't?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c0
STRING: [Chris] “I'll think about it. then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36d6
STRING: It wasn't that I was confident that things would work
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e2
STRING: But I couldn't help that I had no ideas.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36ee
STRING: [Chris] “Is that bad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3720
STRING: [Torta] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3736
STRING: After a sigh and a long silence, Torta finally smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3768
STRING: [Torta] “Well, alright. That is just like you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378c
STRING: Torta letting me off by saying it was “like me,” had
become a standard routine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a2
STRING: She was playing the same role as when the three of us
were kids.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37b8
STRING: Torta was one of the twins born a few months after me,
and she was the younger sister.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37ce
STRING: Being the same age as me, it was a little strange for her
to be letting me off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e4
STRING: But Arie was a quiet one, and I wasn't one to worry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37fa
STRING: As if to make up for that, Torta was a strong-minded
person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3810
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for understanding. Anyway, what was
that about a rumor?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384c
STRING: [Torta] “So you really don't know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3862
STRING: [Chris] “No. So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x387e
STRING: [Chris] “Um... I said I had an idea, but the truth is, it isn't
decided yet. If it comes to it, Ms. Cordell will ask a voice
student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c4
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh... I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38da
STRING: [Chris] “What did you think I was going to say...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390c
STRING: [Torta] “N-Nothing. Yeah, right... I didn't believe the
rumor would apply to you, Chris. I didn't think you'd
cheat on Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3936
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3968
STRING: [Torta] “I'm kidding, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x397e
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3994
STRING: I passed it off lightly to avoid any more questions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39bc
STRING: [Torta] “Hee-hee...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39d2
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39f0
STRING: [Torta] “Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a06
STRING: [Chris] “Whatever...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a38
STRING: [Torta] “I like that about you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4e
STRING: [Chris] “Like what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a80
STRING: [Torta] “That you're a little... irresponsible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a96
STRING: [Chris] “What? That's not a good thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ac8
STRING: [Torta] “That's not true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ade
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b10
STRING: [Torta] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b26
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b58
STRING: [Torta] “You should probably fix that irresponsible
side...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b78
STRING: [Chris] “What's this all about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3baa
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha. You don't need to know. So what
were we talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bca
STRING: [Chris] “The rumor, I think?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bfc
STRING: [Torta] “Rumor, which one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c12
STRING: [Chris] “That's what I'm asking. You're the one talking
about believing rumors and cheating, aren't you, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c3a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, that rumor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c50
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. So, what is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c88
STRING: [Torta] “It's the same old stuff. I think it was that the
men and women who perform together at the
graduation presentation end up together forever...
Or something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's something you'd hear at any school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc6
STRING: [Torta] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cdc
STRING: [Chris] “Huh. You don't seem very interested, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cfa
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I mean, people whose tastes match, tend
to match up as people, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d22
STRING: [Torta] “They practice long hours together, and they like
so many of the same things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d42
STRING: [Chris] “They have similar goals as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d60
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d76
STRING: Torta nodded as if she totally understood and gave a
faint smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da8
STRING: [Torta] “Of course, you're not interested.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dbe
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't even decided on my partner yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dfa
STRING: [Torta] “And yet you go on with such confidence.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e10
STRING: [Chris] “Go on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e2e
STRING: [Torta] “About the psychology of men and women in
love.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e44
STRING: [Chris] “Even though you said more than half of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e76
STRING: [Torta] “You were right there with me, Chris. It doesn't
suit you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8c
STRING: [Chris] “Who doesn't it suit? At least I have a girlfriend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ebe
STRING: [Torta] “My big sister doesn't count. You just ended up
with her because you were friends.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ede
STRING: [Chris] “You're one to talk, you've never even been in a
relationship.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f10
STRING: [Torta] “Big words from someone who thinks that what
they know is all there is to know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f30
STRING: We argued as far as that,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4c
STRING: then we looked at each other and laughed lightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f70
STRING: Torta and Arie... My two childhood friends. I can still
remember every detail of growing up so close to them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fb8
STRING: A boy and twin girls born in the same year, and living
close by to boot. We naturally lived like we were family.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fd8
STRING: The boy happened to have a talent for playing the
Fortelle, and the younger of the twins was a gifted
singer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ff0
STRING: But the older sister didn't do anything special.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ffc
STRING: So both sets of parents thought that the younger sister
was more suited to the boy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4012
STRING: But at some point the boy got together with the older
sister, and this was accepted as natural, if only among
the children.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4034
STRING: The talented twosome went to the city of music to
realize their dreams, while the one left behind pursued
her own dream in their hometown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4056
STRING: The lovers were bound together by weekly letters, the
only way to stay connected over the unbearable
distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x407c
STRING: Their relationship was hampered by the fact that one
was by the sea, and the other surrounded by
mountains.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4092
STRING: You couldn't go anywhere without passing through a
long tunnel carved through the mountains.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40a8
STRING: Even to get to the closest city, it was necessary to ride
a steam train for half a day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c0
STRING: This was the magnitude of the gap between the two of
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4110
STRING: [Torta] “You're lost in thought again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4126
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4158
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's fine... Anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x416e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x418c
STRING: [Torta] “You have to find a partner soon. Okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41a2
STRING: [Chris] “I know. Well, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41d4
STRING: [Torta] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41ea
STRING: [Chris] “Really. Ms. Cordell's on my case, too. What
about you, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4226
STRING: [Torta] “Me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x423c
STRING: [Chris] “Do you have a partner already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x426e
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-uh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4284
STRING: [Chris] “But you said...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42b6
STRING: [Torta] “I think... It would be best for you if you didn't
say any more, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42d6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4308
STRING: [Torta] “Voice students can perform solo. Well, the
marks are better when paired with a Fortelle player, so
there are quite a few people working on that
assumption.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4332
STRING: [Chris] “But are you going to perform solo, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4350
STRING: [Torta] “It'll be easier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4366
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4384
STRING: [Torta] “And...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43ae
STRING: I knew what she would say next the moment before she
said it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43ba
STRING: That's how close Torta and I were now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43ce
STRING: [Torta] “If a certain someone really can't find a partner,
it would be better if there was at least one candidate,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43ee
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4420
STRING: [Torta] “But that doesn't mean you don't need to look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4436
STRING: [Chris] “I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4460
STRING: We were... Almost closer than lovers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x446c
STRING: That was why I thought it would be better to put some
distance, even forced, between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4482
STRING: [Chris] “But.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44ac
STRING: Unconsciously trying to find a reason to avoid Torta, I
continued in a light tone to counter the uneasy tension
between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c2
STRING: [Chris] “Don't you think it's unfair that vocalists are free
to choose like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44ea
STRING: [Torta] “No, I don't. I mean, just being able to play the
Fortelle gets students special treatment at the school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x450a
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't ask for that. And it may be special
treatment, but I still work hard. I can't help that I was
born this way, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x453c
STRING: [Torta] “Being born like that is important in this case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4552
STRING: [Chris] “Only for the rarity.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4584
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha, I think it's amazing you're not just
trying to be humble, Chris. You really feel that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45a4
STRING: [Chris] “What a compliment...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c2
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe it wasn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45d8
STRING: [Chris] “Which is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460a
STRING: [Torta] “Why don't you choose?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4620
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, then it wasn't a compliment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x463e
STRING: [Torta] “Fine, then. How very like you to focus on the
negative.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x465e
STRING: I felt too comfortable with this all-too-familiar
interaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x466a
STRING: I had to heave a deep sigh in order to guard against it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4680
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ I wonder why Fortelle students have to
pair with voice students?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46a8
STRING: [Torta] “Because a human voice pairs best with the
Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c8
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... I feel like I've heard that before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46fa
STRING: [Torta] “What do you mean? Don't you remember
learning it in class?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4710
STRING: [Chris] “Did I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4742
STRING: [Torta] “In your first year. In the Fortelle history lecture.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4758
STRING: [Chris] “Is it possible I didn't take that class?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x478a
STRING: [Torta] “Nope... Okay I'll ask, what is your major?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47aa
STRING: [Chris] “Fortelle... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47dc
STRING: [Torta] “Oh boy, it must be nice to be able to make
one's way in life with just natural ability.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47fc
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, you're making fun of all the Fortelle
students.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x482e
STRING: [Torta] “No. I was talking only about you, Chris. You're
so bad at taking notes, but you always get high marks
on your playing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x484e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4880
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah-yeah... Listen. Really listen, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48b2
STRING: [Torta] “The sound of a Fortelle is made good or bad
depending on the nature of the individual. You could
call it individuality.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48da
STRING: [Torta] “Just as each person has a different voice, the
tone of the Fortelle changes depending on the person.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4902
STRING: [Torta] “And it has the capacity to be changed by
thoughts and emotions.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x492a
STRING: [Torta] “It can be filled with a richer range of emotions
than other instruments. So it pairs well with vocals,
which can express the same emotional richness
according to the verse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 492a
STRING: [Torta] Understand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4954
STRING: [Chris] “I understand... I basically understand what
you're saying, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4990
STRING: [Torta] “Alright, good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49a6
STRING: [Chris] “But I don't think that's a good reason for a
Fortelle to have to pair with a voice student. Voice
students can perform solo. Isn't that unfair?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49ec
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a1a
STRING: Oh... That's what you mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a26
STRING: [Chris] “You explained it for me, but missed the point.
And you were making fun of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a62
STRING: [Torta] “Well... Of course I made fun of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a78
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Wh-Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4aaa
STRING: [Torta] “Think about it. It's because there are so few
Fortelle students. There's twice as many voice students,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ad4
STRING: [Chris] “That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b06
STRING: [Torta] “Do you understand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b1c
STRING: [Chris] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b4e
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha. So now you really get it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b6e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I understand. I'll really look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ba0
STRING: [Torta] “Good... Oh, I could help you look if you want. I
can introduce you to some people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bce
STRING: Just like me, Torta was finished with her morning
lesson.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be4
STRING: We always just parted ways after eating together here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c42
STRING: It really was a welcome offer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4e
STRING: [Chris] “I think I'll take you up on that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c80
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. I'll ask around then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c96
STRING: [Chris] “Right. But you have some leads, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc8
STRING: [Torta] “I know that you have none, Chris. Just stick with
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ce8
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d80
STRING: [Chris] “Hmmm... Maybe not today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4db2
STRING: [Torta] “That means you don't plan to do anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dc8
STRING: [Chris] “Not necessarily. But I don't want to put it all on
you from the start, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e04
STRING: [Torta] “Ooh, how commendable of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e1a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure. I've had a lot of people talking to me
about it lately.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4c
STRING: [Torta] “I assume that Arie talking about it was
effective?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e62
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. I wish you wouldn't write about me
in your letters to her, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e9e
STRING: [Torta] “I wouldn't write to my sister about it if it wasn't
important. Your graduation is on the line. Any
objections?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ec8
STRING: [Chris] “None...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4efa
STRING: [Torta] “Good. So what's this about not starting today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f10
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'm sure I'll ask you soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f2e
STRING: [Torta] “You can ask anytime. Just ask me to lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f44
STRING: [Chris] “Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fa0
STRING: [Torta] “Alright, I think I'll go after I eat this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fb6
STRING: We must have talked a while, as there were far fewer
people in the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fcc
STRING: Having noticed this, Torta hurriedly stuffed her
remaining sandwich in her mouth and spoke with her
mouth full.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ffe
STRING: [Torta] “What time is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5014
STRING: [Chris] “After one-twenty, I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5046
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks... See you tomorrow, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5072
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah, see ya.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5092
STRING: The lunch break ended at one-thirty, so I still had time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50a8
STRING: It was common for the practice rooms to filled up after
lunch on Mondays.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50be
STRING: It seemed that everyone believed that famous saying by
some unknown music professor, “Neglect your
instrument for one day, lose three days of skill.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50de
STRING: Of course there was no school on weekends, but hardly
any students spent their two days off without practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50f4
STRING: That's how serious everyone was about music, but
unfortunately, that had nothing to do with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x510a
STRING: So, serious students spend their Saturdays and Sundays
with no classes working away in the practice rooms
from the morning on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5120
STRING: It was common for the practice rooms to be fulled up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512c
STRING: Students like Torta and myself who could practice at
home were better off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5138
STRING: You couldn't sing at the top of your lungs, but it was
considered part of the city's character and generally
accepted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514e
STRING: And there were certain instruments that could be
muted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5164
STRING: But nothing could be done in that regard for the piano,
which featured the largest number of students, or for
string instruments.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x517a
STRING: Which meant that students who couldn't practice at
home or at school would flock to the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5190
STRING: Even Torta spent her days off practicing, unlike me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a6
STRING: I was always in awe of the effort she put into practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51bc
STRING: However, the fact that I couldn't learn from her
example... Maybe that was a difference in personality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51d2
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e8
STRING: I gave a light sigh and considered my options again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51f4
STRING: There was only so much I could do, so I didn't have that
many choices.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x520a
STRING: I didn't know any voice students, so looking around the
practice rooms was no use.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5220
STRING: If I was going to go somewhere, I should go to the
Cenacolo, a free space set aside for the students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5236
STRING: I thought talking with my friend, Asino, might also be an
idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5242
STRING: Or I could just walk around the school aimlessly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5258
STRING: [Chris] “So, what to do?”
